Name: Invoke: Javelin VI
Desc:
Charging the power of the crystal accumulated in crystal shards into javelins, three enchanted 3 javelins are thrown that automatically track and attack enemies.
Javelin runs through and attacks the enemies in a fast pace. When Javelin hits the enemy, it shatters into shards and additionally attacks.
Enchant Javelin can charge a large amount of magical power into the crystal.
Can coordinate with Craft :Orb II and does not get affected from multi-attack skill's attack target increase.
Javelin and Javelin shard tracks a boss monster with higher max HP in the first place.
Required Skill: Invoke: Javelin Lv. 30 or above
